titleStmt.title: The doctrine of ivstification cleared, by animadversions on Mr. John Goodwins animadversions upon Mr. George Walkers Defence of the true sense of the Apostle, Rom. 4, 3, 5 &c. together with an examination of both parts of his treatise of justification : wherein the imputation of faith in a proper sense is denied, and the imputation of Christs righteousnesse active and passive affirmed, against that treatise / By Henry Robrough ...
titleStmt.author: Roborough, Henry, d. 1649?
